alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 11:04AM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wintry mix. Ice accumulations of up to four tenths of an inch possible. Slushy snow and sleet accumulation of up to an inch possible near and east of the southern Green Mountains. * WHERE...St Lawrence Valley and portions of central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
